title: Night Sky
description: Final project for General Assembly's part-time front-end development course, completed in April 2016.

title: Triangles
description: WDI Project Zero at General Assembly (September 2016). Interactive triangles using p5.js.

title: Airbnb

title: Covered

title: Business As Usual
description: Final Project at General Assembly. 3D visual representation of climate data Built using Ruby on Rails, leaflet.js & three.js
